70010000082488.description:
How exciting can the routine of a 5th Dimensional librarian be?

In "The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure", players embark on an exciting journey as Verbum, a librarian from the 5th Dimension, whose mission is to rid the LibreArca library of a terrible threat: the Molds. These sinister creatures are corrupting the books of interdimensional knowledge, endangering the stability of the entire universe.

In a world made of blocks, providing a visually captivating environment full of mysteries, you must, to advance in the game, use your dexterity and reasoning to overcome complex obstacles and unravel the puzzle that is each chapter of the books.

You must find the right way to activate all the Totems, while eliminating the Molds, until you reach the portal to go to the next chapter.

Note that each Mold requires a different amount of Orbs to eliminate.

Each stage presents a unique set of challenges and environments, taking players into worlds beyond comprehension, filled with surreal landscapes and magical artifacts. The immersive narrative propels players to explore every corner of this extraordinary universe in order to gather energy and resources to purify books affected by Molds.

Get ready for a truly exciting gaming experience filled with interdimensional mysteries and thrilling challenges in "The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure". The LiberArca library is counting on you to restore order and protect interdimensional knowledge!

Are you ready for this unique and magical adventure?
70010000082488.intro: Unravel Mysteries, Overcome Complex Obstacles, and Solve the Puzzle! Rid the Library of a Terrible Threat.
70010000082488.name: The Books Tale: A hop adventure!

70010000083215.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey in Project Moonshot, the must-play physics-based rocket game that will keep you hooked for hours!

Your Mission: Launch rockets carrying astronaut payloads to the Moon and, ultimately, Mars. Master the timing of each stage release using intuitive touch controls or a controller. Earn money from successful launches and invest it in upgrading rocket stages and spaceports. Personalise your rocket with dazzling new skins. The more astronauts you send to colonise planets, the bigger your payouts, letting you enjoy luxurious holidays on Earth!

Compete with Friends: Climb the ranks on the Global Champion Leaderboard and see who can launch the furthest!

Get ready for an out-of-this-world adventure with Project Moonshot!
70010000083215.intro: Blast off in Project Moonshot: The Addictive Rocket Adventure You Can't Put Down!
70010000083215.name: Moonshot

70010000085478.description:
Step into the shoes of a supermarket owner in Supermarket Manager 2024, a dynamic 3D supermarket simulator where your business acumen will be put to the test! As the proud proprietor, your goal is to grow your supermarket empire by making smart purchasing decisions and optimizing your sales strategies.

Key Features:
Business Growth: Purchase a variety of products from different providers and strategically price them to attract more customers and maximize profits.

Financial Management: Handle transactions with ease as customers pay with cash or credit cards. Use your earnings to invest back into your supermarket.

Upgrades and Expansion: Reinvent your supermarket with upgrades and expansions. Enhance your store's layout, stock more products, and improve customer satisfaction to become the leading supermarket in town.

Strategic Gameplay: Balance supply and demand, manage stock levels, and respond to customer preferences to keep your business thriving.

Immersive 3D Environment: Experience the bustling atmosphere of a supermarket with stunning 3D graphics and detailed animations.

Can you transform your modest store into a thriving retail giant? Find out in Supermarket Manager 2024, where every decision counts towards building your supermarket success story!
70010000085478.intro: Can you transform your modest store into a thriving retail giant?
70010000085478.name: Supermarket Manager 2024

70050000051260.description:
YAMAT, THE BREACH TRAVELER
Play as Yamat, a powerful Breach Traveler who has wandered through countless astral prisons created by the Master. She seeks to challenge the strongest fighters and prove her worth.

This new prisoner has a bold personality and harbors many mysteries. Her motivations and personal goals will unfold with each escape attempt.

WEAPONS
Yamat can use 3 different weapons types for different playstyles:
- Dark Energy Fists: Close-range quick attacks of dark matter, unleashing flaming magical creatures.
- Two-Handed Dark Sword: Long-range powerful slashes that can hit multiple enemies at once.
- Dark Bow: Long-range attacks that shower enemies with arrows.

SPELLS, PERKS AND PASSIVES
- 16 unique spells: Summon powerful wild creatures, unleash spinning giant blades, and more!
- Forbidden Power: With this Signature Spell, Yamat transforms into her flying draconic form, allowing her to move freely while shooting magic missiles at nearby enemies.
- 37 associated perks: Modify her Signature Spell to suit your playstyle.
- 9 weapon passives: Each weapon comes with 3 unique passives, making Yamat an even deadlier fighter.

OTHER CONTENT
- New Papa Yalee stories: 4 new stories that delve deeper into the mysterious Yamat.
- 1000+ new lines of dialogue: Interact with Yamat and all the other characters in the Garden, including heroes, fully voiced in English and Japanese.
- Cinematics and ending screens: New cinematics and a new ending screen has been added for Yamat!

HOW TO ACCESS YAMAT
If you have not yet met Yamat in the Garden, she will appear after a couple of escape attempts.

ADDITIONS TO THE BASE GAME
Even without owning this add-on content, you will still be able to:

- See Yamat hanging out in the Garden.
- Collect and use 2 Yamat Echoes during runs.
- Fight Yamat's Shadow Clone.
70050000051260.intro: Play as Yamat, a powerful dark mage summoning creatures, fighting with a bow and great sword!
70050000051260.name: Yamat - The Breach Traveler

70010000069398.description:
Beatbuddy interacts with the living breathing environment that pulses to the beat of an original soundtrack, aiding him as he unlocks new paths and solves puzzles.

KEY FEATURES

- Experience an action-adventure game in a whole new way, which incorporates music into every aspect of the vibrant world Symphonia.
- Six beautifully hand-painted levels, each broken into five chapters, take the player through the unique locations and vivid colour palettes.
- Featuring an exclusively produced soundtrack with original songs composed specifically for the game by known artists, including Austin Wintory, Parov Stelar, Sabrepulse and La Rochelle Band.
- Play as Beatbuddy, an ethereal creature who travels to unite with his sisters Melody and Harmony and stop the evil Prince Maestro with the aid of Clef, who provides comic relief throughout their journey.
70010000069398.intro: Awakened from his slumber, Beatbuddy journeys through lush hand-painted environments on a quest to save his companions and his own immortality.
70010000069398.name: Beatbuddy: Tale of the Guardians

70010000084398.description:
Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery is a cozy hidden object game that has you searching for hidden objects in hand-drawn, interactive landscapes. Ignite your imagination, unleash your inner artist with the editor and share your masterpieces with the world!

THREE ERAS TO DISCOVER
Dive into three captivating eras: Victorian elegance, Noir mystery, and Sci-fi wonder. Test your keen eye and unravel the mysteries hidden within each intricate scene. Can you uncover every secret the past (and future) holds?

CREATE YOUR OWN WORLDS
Unleash your creativity with the map editor! Craft your own worlds filled with wonders and surprises. Select assets from different eras, populate your creation with characters, and watch your imagination come to life.

PLAY & SHARE
The adventure doesn't end with the campaign! Join the online community and explore a plethora of user-generated maps. Delve into captivating worlds, seek out hidden objects, and share your favorite discoveries with fellow adventurers.

Features
- Immerse yourself in relaxing gameplay with no timers to rush your exploration
- Travel through time and uncover hidden secrets in beautifully hand-drawn landscapes
- Design your own maps using the intuitive map editor
- Decode cryptic hints to aid you on your quest
- Enjoy a soothing soundtrack as you lose yourself in the art of discovery
70010000084398.intro: Discover, create and share worlds with your own hidden treasures!
70010000084398.name: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery

70070000023297.description:
Get ready for to embark on the thrilling adventure of a lifetime as you assume the role of a skilled bus driver, navigating through the bustling city and ensuring passengers reach their destinations on time! Now your journey is set to become even more exhilarating because just got a major upgrade, thanks to our new Bundle Bus Simulator 2024: City Driver - Premium Edition, Consists of the main game and the latest DLC

Here's why you won't want to miss out:
	•	$150,000 Cash Boost: Kickstart your journey with a hefty cash injection, instantly elevate your city driving experience.
	•	Explore a Vibrant Open-World: Navigate a meticulously crafted metropolis.
	•	17 Unique Buses: Use your cash boost to expand and upgrade your fleet, each bus with its own unique features.
	•	Boost Your Earnings: Pick up passengers and watch your profits soar.
	•	Immersive Gameplay: Enjoy dynamic AI, stunning graphics, and realistic bus physics
Jump on board and feel the thrill of the city streets with the our new bundle that makes you test the most exciting sensations
70070000023297.intro: Maximize your profits, upgrade your fleet and enjoy Immersive gameplay with our with the complete bus driving premium bundle!
70070000023297.name: Bus Simulator 2024: City Driver - Premium Edition

70010000053945.description:
Max has always been the more unhinged member of the Freelance Police—a lovable lunatic with a knack for spreading chaos wherever he goes. But recently his abilities have taken a supernatural turn.
It all started when he stumbled upon a mysterious toy that allows him to glimpse the future. Now Sam & Max have aroused the attention of a host of villains from across the galaxy who are hellbent on acquiring the magical Toys of Power to achieve their own ends.
As those who seek the Devil’s Toybox close in and Max’s psychic abilities grow beyond his control, the Freelance Police will come up against their most frightening adversary yet: the power of Max’s mind.
Explore odd locales, meet eccentric characters, and solve brain-tickling puzzles in this bizarre paranormal adventure with a surprise around every corner. Jump into Max’s brain and use the Toys of Power to see the future, teleport, and read minds. 
Sam & Max: The Devil’s Playhouse has been lovingly remastered by members of the original team, with lighting, lip-sync, cinematography, music, and more updated and enhanced to bring Telltale’s acclaimed game up to modern standards. See the episodic Sam & Max series through to its epic conclusion!
70010000053945.intro: The final game in Telltale’s Sam & Max trilogy, beautifully remastered!
70010000053945.name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse

70010000081083.description:
One day, their peaceful existence is disrupted by the sudden appearance of a computer virus that threatens all sentient programs. Ash takes on the role of a detective to unravel the mystery of this virus.

You can switch between Ash and his virtual assistant. Only one character can access certain locations.

- Complete tasks and get paid for them
- Create items in the generator
- Monitor your mental health
- Fantastic adventures and an unexplored world await you
- Work in tandem with your assistant
- Find out what's really going on
- Expose the criminal
70010000081083.intro: Cat's Request is a fantastic detective story about an extraterrestrial cat named Ash and his virtual assistant, living in a metropolis governed by artificial intelligence.
70010000081083.name: Cat's Request

70010000082373.description:
Get ready for retro vertical shoot’em up action where you’ll face off against swarms of mythical insect baddies using shuriken, bombs and more in the ultimate fight for survival! Switch between spread and focus shot types, unlock 4 unique hoverbikes, pick up coins and permanently upgrade weapons to stack the deck in your favor for the next exciting run.

The more you play, the stronger you get! Stage elements are randomized to keep you on your toes across uniquely themed levels, each with dedicated original background music! Take down 6 unique boss types and challenge online leaderboards. Can you become a true ninpo master?

Tiny Pixels Vol. 1 - Ninpo Blast is the first in a line of pixel art titles inspired by arcade and console classics!

Features:

• Master bullet hell stages against swarms of insect baddies!
• Easily switch between focus or spread shot types.
• Collect coins to buy permanent upgrades, making you more powerful for future runs.
• Unlock new hoverbike skins to customize the experience!
• Face off against 6 big boss types and challenge online leaderboards.
• Enjoy unique background music and graphical themes across multiple stages!
70010000082373.intro: Jump on your hoverbike and blast off for unlimited ninja-themed bullet hell mayhem!
70010000082373.name: Tiny Pixels Vol. 1 - Ninpo Blast

70010000054300.description:
New to the 8-bit gaming scene, it’s Space Raft!

Wait, what?

Yes, Milwaukee’s hungriest band Space Raft is now in an 8-bit adventure.

Join the band on their quest to retrieve the master tapes of their new record "Positively Space Raft" from the clutches of their jealous ex-bass player Srini!

Get behind the wheel of the Space Raft Van and steer the band past obstacles while navigating through traffic. Take control of your favourite band member and clear the screen of sandwiches to thwart the plans of the meddling Srinimania!

An 8-bit adventure designed specifically for music lovers! Recover the stolen master tapes! Release the new Space Raft record! Road trip!

– Soundtrack featuring chiptuned songs from ‘Positively Space Raft’!
– Recognisable people and places from the Milwaukee independent music scene, including DMR alumni!
– Six obstacle-based scrolling stages!
– Fifteen arcade-style music venue stages!
– Two huge dungeon levels!
– Four playable characters with unique abilities!
– Sound Test screen with a playable drum kit!
– Boss fights!
– Minifridge!
– The Sandwich!
70010000054300.intro: Embark on a rock 'n' roll 8-bit adventure with Space Raft and save the music!
70010000054300.name: Space Raft

70010000064958.description:
Enter the breathtakingly beautiful world of Arco, a unique tactical action game where your decisions shape the story. Journey through lush forests, sweeping plains, and scorching deserts as you guide four unlikely heroes in their vendetta against the Red Company gang. Battle warriors of different nations, fend off greedy colonisers, and slay monstrous creatures as you voyage across this enchanted land. Change your fate, one move at a time.

Features: 
- Cleverly plan your next move in a unique, “simultaneous turn-based” combat system.
- Unlock new game-changing skills, recruit powerful allies, and collect life-saving resources as you progress.
- Progress through each campaign as a different character with their own set of special abilities.
- Dive into a tale full of danger and excitement and watch it unfold from multiple viewpoints.
- Explore a fantastical world brought to life by evocative pixel art and an atmospheric score.
70010000064958.intro: Three tales forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.
70010000064958.name: Arco

70010000070681.description:
Phantom Spark is an exhilarating high-speed racing game that will test your limits. Push for your best time in precision time-trial races across three domains full of otherworldly architecture. Take on challenges, hone your skills, and master the pathways to surpass the champions.

Light The Spark
Pushing you forward in the single-player campaign, you have the domain champions. Giving you the drive to set ever-faster times, acting as both guides and opponents. As you best each champion, and your spark strengthens, you will unlock new pathways and ships.

Hone Your Skills
Competing against ghost opponents allows you to see the current best time in action, letting you improve your racing line and find those extra fractions of a second. With instant restarts, you stay in the rhythm, keeping focus as you refine your times on each pathway. 

Online Play
See how you measure up against the best in the world and your friends with online leaderboards. Forge rivalries and seek to be the best as you master over 30 unique pathways.

Light The Spark
Each region has its own Champion who will push players to evolve and adapt upon their best time in the single-player campaign, encouraging competition even in single-player mode.

Hone Your Skills
You’ll be able to race against your own ghost and analyse each twist and turn in the effort to increase your speeds, unlock challenges and cosmetics for your ship as you discover new tracks winding through the ruins of this forgotten world.
 
Online Play
The competition never ends - play against the best in our online leaderboards and against your friends. Forge rivalries and become the best as you hone your skills on over 30 unique tracks.

Key Features
- Over 30 tracks and challenges built to be replayed as you improve your skills.
- Race against each region Champion to encourage competition even in single-player.
- Distinct regions, each boasting unique themes alongside a mesmerising soundtrack.
- Online leaderboards to get you charged up and ready to race!
- Showcase your best times with our replay feature.
70010000070681.name: Phantom Spark

70010000071827.description:
===================== 
Highlights
===================== 
* Explore 10 unique and sandbox-y levels
* Customize your crow with cute hats, scarves, and more
* Use variety of tools and objects you pick up
* Eat delicious foods and discover new "poop modes"
* Make new animal friends and help them out

===================== 
Did you know: Crows are really curious birds?  
===================== 
In this level-based, sandbox-y adventure game, you must become the coolest bird in town and earn the trust of new animal friends. Completed tasks to slowly build up your Crowputation across diverse settings, such a quaint French Riviera, Ancient Egypt, or bustling New York. Some tasks will test your skill, some will test your intellect, and some are honestly just really dumb. Pick and choose the most fun ways to create Adorable Chaos™ - there's something for everyone here!

Spread your wings and soar to new heights of cuteness as you customize your adorable crow-tastic appearance!

===================== 
Did you know: Crows are one of few creatures to use tools?  
===================== 
In "Just Crow Things", you can live out all your crowy fantasies. Pick up all sorts of objects and make good use of them, like a leafblower to (literally) blow people a way, a graffiti can to mark your territory, or a blow torch to... uhh... warm people up at night. Yup. That's, uuh, that's totally the intended use here.

And don't forget the different poop modes, from glitter bombs to ~spicy~ poops...

======= Did you know: Crows achieve highest academic scores on standardized tests? ======= 
Ok, we might be fudging some data here... but the point stands! The game will give you a number of optional side tasks to challenge you further - find all the hidden hats and skins, beat racing challenges across the world, and unlock a special Sandbox Mode where you can spawn all sorts of tools of mayhem.

Anything is possible when you're a crow!
70010000071827.intro: You're a little crow trying to prove herself to the world. Make new animal friends, poop on unsuspecting hoomans, and steal all the shiny trinkets!
70010000071827.name: Just Crow Things

70010000075087.description:
Use your creativity and imagination to solve charming physics puzzles by drawing a single shape and watching what unfolds! Complete the objectives of 250 puzzles (with more on the way), each with multiple and often surprising solutions. How you draw your solution is up to you!

Solve puzzles and earn rewards to build your very own Squiggletown! Unlock buildings, cosmetics and various upgrades as you expand your own personal city.

Squiggle Drop Features:
- 250 levels
- Regular Content Updates
- Daily Challenges
- Challenging your friends to beat your scores
- Earn Achievements
70010000075087.intro: Draw shapes to solve physics puzzles! Over 250 levels each with their own unique objective. Put your brain to the test.
70010000075087.name: Squiggle Drop

70010000075828.description:
The Godfeather is a mafia pigeon roguelike combining elements of stealth, open world exploration and poop… lots of poop!

Used to be an honest boid could make a living... now your enemies have moved in and flocked up the whole operation. The Godfeather tasks you with taking back the old neighborhood- one borough at a time. It’s time to send a message… FROM ABOVE!

SWOOP & POOP

Use all the powers of pigeon persuasion to dominate the neighborhood. When HQ radios in with your next target, you’ll wanna pay a visit as soon as possible. SWOOP to strike fear in your enemies and POOP to take out your targets from above.

Loot dumpsters to reload your poop ammo and scour the neighborhood for the fabled Golden Twigs of Pigeon legend.

It's time for payback on all enemies of the organisation. Whether it's tree snitches, diners at brunch, enemy birds, rival suppliers, fleeing informants or fresh laundry just waiting to be redecorated - they all gotta go.

DODGE THE FIVE-O!

The enemy has spies everywhere. Get spotted by a cockatoo lookout and they’ll call in the heat instantly. Once that happens, you've got seconds before a drone comes to capture you. Find a tree or a dumpster to hide in until the heat's off, because once you get pinched- it’s game over.

Drones aren’t the only thing a boid has to worry about - cats stalk the rooftops, lawn Karens have garden hoses with your name on it and deadly owls are just waiting to swoop you at sunset.

TOOL UP FOR VICTORY

Even soldiers need their down time. Visit the roost between runs to get fitted out with the very latest in boid technology. Upgrade your abilities, equip gadgets to give you the edge or get a whole new look to keep your plumage looking tight out there.

BECOME A LEGEND

The Godfeather challenges you to survive brutal procedurally-generated neighborhoods from the suburbs to the boidwalk to the city - each filled with unique targets, hazards, increasing difficulty and deadly area bosses.

You mail fail, but dust off your feathers and take another run at victory. As you succeed, your legend grows and you edge closer to uncovering the dark secret at the heart of the pigeon mafia. Could you be the next Godfeather?
70010000075828.name: The Godfeather: A Mafia Pigeon Saga

70010000077646.description:
You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.
Within every area of the world, you must find a certain amount of memory shards to remember the path that leads to your destination and advance with the story. Once you have found all the memory shards you are free to explore the next area.
70010000077646.intro: You play as a little bird-like spirit that watches ancient civilizations evolve.
70010000077646.name: Aery - Ancient Empires

70010000078930.description:
Build the most powerful and dangerous land in all of Arcadia! Stake forests, swamps, graveyards, and volcanoes, recruit monsters and create the best combinations to collect the most points to become the Overboss. Be careful - each terrain type is scored differently, and your minions must be arranged on them strategically to maximize their value!

Step into the shoes of 12 iconic bosses from the renowned board game Overboss, who want to attain supreme power by building their kingdom. The value of your dominion hinges on the arrangement of terrain tiles and the strategic placement of your monstrous minions. Each tile type and its positioning can either bolster or hinder your ascent to dominance.

• The game includes free DLC featuring new Tower tiles, as well as The Collective and The Brothers Wise bosses!
• Play in solo or multiplayer mode, for up to 5 players.
• Start the game with a special Boss power and a secret scoring goal.
• Pick your tiles and place the tokens on the board.
• Choose from 11 terrain types.
• Use Portals to move your Monsters and Minibosses.
• Collect Crystals to multiply your power.
• Use command cards to add more challenge.
• Make combos to achieve the highest score and become the OVERBOSS!

Digital version not only boasts captivating pixel-art graphics reminiscent of retro video games but also immerses in a beloved universe that has captured the hearts of enthusiasts worldwide. It’s a puzzle tile-laying adventure for gamers of all skill levels, with intuitive and straightforward rules.
70010000078930.intro: It's time to come out of the underworld and conquer the world!
70010000078930.name: Overboss

70010000080659.intro: Welcome to the arcade world of battle tanks! Get into the tank, go to the battlefield and complete all combat missions!
70010000080659.name: Arcade Tanks World: Tank Battle Simulator

70010000082440.description:
Minami Lane is a small, wholesome management game set on a Japanese-inspired street. Create and manage your own street, make sure everyone is happy, and watch the villagers live their lives! Enjoy 2 to 4 hours of playtime, cute tanukis and lots of cats!

GAMEPLAY

Build your street
Build homes to add villagers to your street, then improve their happiness by beautifying every inch and building a variety of shops & attractions! These include ramen shops, boba cafes, bookstores and more, each with unique inventories and effects.

Manage your shops
Attract customers with everything from floral bouquets to karaoke! Shops you create will need your careful guidance to offer the right products at the right prices. Lead them to success and make your neighborhood thrive.

Watch your villagers live their lives
Once you start the day, you'll get to see each villager react to your street and offer helpful feedback on how to improve! Memorize their preferences and refine your street the following day.

Reach your objectives
Complete missions to unlock new levels with more buildings, villager types, and other surprises.

FEATURES
What Minami Lane offers:
• 2-4 hours of play time
• Create and customize your own adorable street
• Manage shops by adjusting their inventory, recipes, and prices
• Play strategically to complete each level's mission objectives
• Keep the streets clean by picking up trash
• Tanukis and cats!

What Minami Lane does not offer:
• Hardcore strategy
• Multiplayer
• Tons of missions
• New levels after release

GAME MODES

• In Minami Lane's missions, you'll need to strategically plan each day and use elements such as random events to your advantage to complete multiple objectives.
• The sandbox mode focuses on creativity and relaxation, allowing you to immerse yourself in the peaceful, cozy world without the stress of objectives.
70010000082440.intro:
Build your own street in this tiny cozy, 
casual management sim.
70010000082440.name: Minami Lane

70010000083022.description:
Play the young witch Flora and discover a bustling town in this Metroidvania-inspired wholesome cooking game. Cook meals and potions in your customized kitchen by carefully selecting the right ingredients. Navigate the town in casual platforming to meet the townsfolk, take up their orders, and learn about this world of magic. 

Flora travels to a distant town to fulfill her dream of becoming a proper witch. She opens up shop in Grat, a harbor town built upon cliffs, where adventurers settled to chart an unexplored island full of mystery. As she engages in the town’s thriving economy, she stumbles upon two members of opposing covens. The witch Cassia and the magus Tauno have a lot to teach Flora, but they also know how to use her in their dispute about magical beings.
70010000083022.intro: Learn new ways to traverse, discover secrets, and experience a unique witchy world.
70010000083022.name: Magical Delicacy

70010000083171.description:
Embark on a high-octane, adrenaline-fueled adventure in Cybermania Parkour Uprising, a thrilling 3D game that merges the electrifying art of parkour with a dystopian cyberpunk world. Players are thrust into a sprawling urban landscape where freedom comes at a cost and agility is the ultimate weapon.

Key Features:
Dynamic Parkour Gameplay: Master the art of movement and freedom with seamless parkour mechanics. Run, jump, climb, and slide through futuristic cityscapes filled with obstacles and challenges.

Choose Your Champion: Select from a diverse roster of characters, each with their own unique skills and abilities. Whether you prefer speed, agility, or strength, there's a character to suit every play style.

Immersive Cyberpunk World: Explore a vividly realized cyberpunk universe, where neon-lit skyscrapers and dark alleyways create the backdrop for an uprising against oppressive forces.

Customization and Progression: Unlock new characters, abilities, and customization options as you progress. Build your character to suit your preferred play style and dominate the cityscape.

Synopsis:
In a world where the city is a playground and the only way up is to defy gravity, Cybermania Parkour Uprising pits players against the forces of oppression in a fight for freedom. Are you ready to rise above and become the ultimate parkour champion?
70010000083171.intro: Are you ready to rise above and become the ultimate parkour champion?
70010000083171.name: Cybermania Parkour Uprising

70010000083445.intro: You are immersed in a world of creativity and self-expression, where everyone can become a real artist in the colouring book simulator!
70010000083445.name: Amazing Drawing: Coloring Book Simulator

70010000084774.description:
Welcome to Parking Masters, where you'll face the ultimate test of your parking skills in a variety of challenges! Maneuver vehicles through numerous levels, all designed with realistic physics and a captivating visual style.

Features include

- Extensive levels: Immerse yourself in a variety of parking scenarios with a wide range of challenges to overcome.
- Realistic physics: Prepare for the ultimate parking experience! You'll feel like a real parking pro as you navigate through a variety of vehicles and environments.
- Authentic Vehicle Handling and Dynamics: Feel the thrill of real-world vehicle control as you master each level.
- Unique Visual Style: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world that's both distinctive and captivating.
- Smooth gameplay: Enjoy smooth and responsive controls that ensure a seamless and enjoyable gaming experience.
- Diverse Vehicles: Drive and park a variety of vehicles, each with its own unique driving characteristics.
- Varied environments: Navigate through a spectrum of parking locations.
- Achievements and Rewards: Unlock achievements and rewards as you triumph over each level and advance through the game!

Take on the challenge and see if you have what it takes to become the ultimate parking master!
70010000084774.intro: Face the ultimate test of your parking skills!
70010000084774.name: Parking Masters

70010000085779.description:
Dive into the immersive world of retail management with Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D! Step into the shoes of a savvy entrepreneur and become the proud owner of a bustling fishing shop. Cater to the needs of passionate anglers as you stock your store with an extensive array of fishing gear, equipment, and accessories.

Key Features:
Manage Your Store: Run your very own fishing supermarket, buying goods at competitive prices and selling them for a profit.

Upgrade and Expand: Use your profits to upgrade your store, expand your inventory, and attract more customers.

Realistic 3D Environment: Experience a detailed and immersive 3D world that brings your fishing supermarket to life.

Strategic Planning: Balance supply and demand to maximize your profits and grow your business empire.

Customer Satisfaction: Keep your customers happy with a diverse range of high-quality products and exceptional service.

Whether you're a fan of fishing or just love business simulation games, Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D offers a unique and engaging experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Start your journey as a fishing market tycoon and reel in the profits today!
70010000085779.intro: Are you ready to build your fishing supermarket empire?
70010000085779.name: Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D

70050000050875.description: Embark on a thrilling trucking journey with 50 new levels designed specifically for the ultimate parking experience! Each level presents unique challenges as you maneuver through tight spaces, sharp turns, and intricate layouts with different types of trailers. Whether you're threading the needle in a tight parking space or carefully backing, your skills will be pushed to the limit. Get ready to park like a pro and prove you have what it takes to handle the biggest rigs on the road!
70050000050875.name: Parking Masters - Big Rig

70050000050876.description: Take on the role of a bus driver in 50 all-new parking levels! Each level challenges you to maneuver your bus into increasingly difficult spaces, honing your ability to maneuver a large vehicle with finesse. Each level is designed to test and improve your parking skills. Are you ready to perfect your parking skills and become the ultimate bus driver?
70050000050876.name: Parking Masters - Bus Driver

70070000023482.description:
Welcome to Parking Masters, where you'll face the ultimate test of your parking skills across a vast array of challenges! Maneuver cars, trucks, buses, and vehicles with trailers through numerous levels, all designed with realistic physics and a captivating visual style.

This package includes:
- Parking Masters
- Parking Masters - Big Rig DLC
- Parking Masters - Bus Driver DLC

With the addition of 2 DLCs, take on 100 additional levels that push your precision to the limit as you maneuver large vehicles with finesse and control.

Parking Masters Deluxe Edition offers a realistic and rewarding experience for all parking enthusiasts. Are you ready to prove your mastery and become parking champion?
70070000023482.name: Parking Masters Deluxe Edition

70010000077271.description:
Welcome to Elrentaros, a hinterland town far from the Melvanian capital.
Visiting on a journey, you mingle with the colorful locals
and embark on a quest to find ways to help them.
But your adventure takes a sudden turn when a strange light surrounds you and you wake in a different realm.
Could this be the real universe?
Unravel the secret of the two worlds!


Choose your protagonist, male or female,
and forge deep connections with the people of Elrentaros as you make conversation, listen to their troubles, and come to their aid.
There are ten ""partner characters"" to form bonds with.
Giving gifts to partners can deepen your friendships and unlock battle ""alliances"" in return.
Grow closer, and they might even invite you home for dinner or visit your tent to talk.

When you gain weapons and armor through alliances and dungeon raids, you can combine them into arsenal ""builds"" to tackle the dungeons as they grow ever more formidable!

Cleared dungeons can be faced again at higher ""challenge levels"" to snag better gear.
Tougher dungeons offer higher-spec weapons and armor, so keep taking them on to find your ultimate build!

Unravel the mysteries of your travels between realms and save Elrentaros from a terrible fate with the help of your new friends!
70010000077271.intro:
A new fantasy × reality adventure begins!
Introducing the all-new action RPG, Elrentaros Wanderings!
70010000077271.name: Elrentaros Wanderings

70010000078040.description:
Just another day at a video rental store... right?
Mike thought his dead-end job at the local video rental place would be easy, until a serial killer starts carving up his fellow clerks! Deal with irate customers, horrible bosses, and keep your store clean (well, as clean as it can be.) Don’t worry about the occasional creepy phone call or that person watching you through the front window, it’s all part of the job.
Features:
●	Retro 90's setting drops you back in the analog era
●	Over the top gore!
●	Dark comedic elements!
●	Crusty, disgusting, blood drenched environments!
●	Taxing and rewarding puzzles, but be careful how you solve them...
●	Fully voice acted Multiple endings.... and secrets?
●	Unique and horrific enemy design!

Be kind and rewind…
OR DIE!
70010000078040.intro: Stock the shelves, deal with customers, and RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!
70010000078040.name: Rewind or Die

70010000079644.description:
You are a space mining apprentice with a bright future ahead. However, your superior Commander Neek would rather watch a movie than teach you anything. Can you collect crystals and survive on your own?

Take control of your seeker and become the space miner you always wanted to be.
Turn grid squares to destroy enemy drones before they destroy you.
Solve space-themed puzzles and try to survive!

Features:
- Space-themed puzzles with real-time-strategy elements
- 2-hour-long single-player campaign
- Endless Mode: Play generated levels with seed numbers and unlockables
- Challenge Mode: Try to beat remixed campaign levels
- Chill soundtrack by Muddasheep featuring KAON and Veven
- Character art by Elhyana Guillaume
70010000079644.name: Turn to Mine

70010000081303.description:
Embark on an action-packed adventure in Castaway, diving players into a pixelated and retro universe. Assume the role of Martin, whose spaceship crash-landed on an uncharted island where his faithful pet was taken by hostile creatures. Retrieve your weapons and venture out to rescue your kidnapped companion in this endearing and unexpectedly dynamic world.
Beat the 3 bosses in the concise and delightful "Story Mode" to unlock the thrilling and addictive "Survivor Mode." Ascend a 50-floor tower, with each level presenting increasingly challenging trials!

KEY FEATURES:
• From the "pacifist" mode without enemies or “invincible” to the challenging "unfair" mode, Castaway caters to all ages, from seasoned gamers to younger players discovering the genre for the first time. Try to complete the game as quickly as possible thanks to the speedrun mode!
• Charming Pixel Art Graphics: Immerse yourself in a 2D retro pixel art world reminiscent of classic adventure games. It'll feel like coming home!
• Unique Weapon Abilities: Solve puzzles by acquiring weapons with distinct characteristics - the sword for speed, the pickaxe for power, and the grappling hook for increased mobility.
• Enchanting Soundtrack: Enjoy chiptune melodies, whether heroic or haunting, paying homage to the 8-bit console era!
70010000081303.name: Castaway

70010000081893.description:
Prepare yourself for an adrenaline-pumping experience in Cup Killer, where every object around you becomes a weapon. Face relentless waves of enemies and showcase your strategic prowess in this action-packed game.
        Navigate the battlefield as enemies attack in waves. Disable them by breaking their legs or arms, each decision crucial to your survival. Use environmental objects and enemy body parts as improvised weapons, but keep moving to find new ones as they won't last long.
        Score points with every enemy you defeat, unlocking an arsenal of powerful weapons with effects like freezing, explosions, armor penetration, and multi-shot capabilities. Start on the base map and defend yourself against increasingly challenging waves, earning points to unlock new locations and gear.

Key Features:
	•	Dynamic Enemy Mechanics: Disable and disarm enemies creatively.
	•	Interactive Environment: Turn everything around you into a weapon.
	•	Evolving Arsenal: Unlock and upgrade powerful weapons with unique effects.
	•	Endless Waves of Enemies: Test your endurance and strategy against relentless attackers.
Step into the chaos of Cup Killer and prove your mettle. Every throw, every tactic, every kill brings you one step closer to becoming the ultimate survivor. Are you ready for the challenge?
70010000081893.intro: Transform every object into a weapon master the art of warfare and rise to victory in Cup Killer!
70010000081893.name: Cup Killer - Sandbox Game

70010000083299.description:
Navigate through an overfilled parking lot and move cars out of the way to help them all escape! 

The thought of a parking jam can be overwhelming at first, but don't worry—with a bit of strategy and quick thinking, you can clear the traffic jam and free the cars!  

This parking lot has many vehicles, including small cars, trucks, and SUVs. The jams get increasingly more complicated with each level. Show off how smart you are by clearing them all! 

Try your luck in 5 different game modes:  
•  Parking Jam - Feel the satisfaction of clearing a traffic jam  
•  Challenges - Move cars to free the special vehicle  
•  Boss Levels - Show off your skills with limited moves  
•  Lot Management - Think quickly to take the cars to their lots  
•  Hexa Parking - Feel brilliant by solving unique puzzles 

Features: 
- face over 350 levels!  
- play in five game modes: Parking Jam, Challenges, Boss Levels, Lot Management, and Hexa Parking 
- face off against a friend in local multiplayer mode!   
- complete levels to unlock new maps 
- use powerups to disable hurdles, freeze people, destroy vehicles, and crush entire lanes! 
- collect keys and open prize chests 
- earn coins and spend them on car skins, powerups and trails 

See what it takes to clear the traffic jam and escape the parking lot!
70010000083299.intro: Can you get your car out of a jammed parking lot? Let's find out!
70010000083299.name: Parking Jam

70010000083376.description:
"I remember getting the call vividly. I was trying to finish up for the day, but a stack of paperwork was keeping me late. To be honest, I was also looking for reasons not to go home. My phone rang, I answered it, and the director of the institute was talking, albeit disjointedly, about something that had turned up in a recent survey of The Sirena Deep."

OVERVIEW

Explore a mysterious, abandoned underwater facility at the bottom of the Mariana trench. Who built it? What was it used for? Perhaps you will find answers, or perhaps the answers will find you.

THIS IS A SHORT GAME

You can play through The Sirena Expedition in about an hour. However, there may be some hidden content, for those willing to look for it.

∙ A 2.5D platformer with retro-inspired visuals.
∙ Tense underwater atmosphere and horror.
∙ Innovative puzzle mechanics.
∙ Fully voiced dialogue.
∙ Original soundtrack by beee girlll & Giraffe Cat.
70010000083376.intro: The Sirena Expedition is a short retro-style horror-platformer in which you explore a mysterious underwater facility.
70010000083376.name: The Sirena Expedition

70010000083736.description:
Monsters have attacked the city, and only Ninja can stop them! Grab your sword and double jump, wall-climb and otherwise precision platform your way from your home, all the way to the dark depths where the source of this evil resides...

• Nine worlds of carefully crafted ninja platforming!
• Rad boss fights!
• Died? Rewind at any time, if you'd like! (this difficulty feature can be toggled on/off)
• Stylish limited color palette. Black to white, and red!
• An authentic chiptune soundtrack!
• A fun story delivered through full screen, hand drawn cutscenes!
• Collectables and hidden secrets to unlock extra game modes and other fun stuff!
70010000083736.intro: Mute Crimson DX is an action-packed precision-platformer where you guide Ninja on his quest to overcome great evils!
70010000083736.name: Mute Crimson DX

70010000084509.description:
Join Detective Guy and his trusty sidekick Cleo the clue-sniffing dog as they investigate the mysterious death of a social media starlet in an isolated seaside village.

As you explore the surrounding coastline, search for clues, and interview suspects, can you solve the case and bring the guilty party to justice?

Beware the ghostly curse plaguing the area, or Guy and Cleo might end up being the next victims in this sinister affair...


Features
* Stand-alone whodunit in the Murder Is Game Over series
* Play as a detective and dog crime-solving team
* Explore an eerie seaside village and search for clues
* Interview suspects and make deductions
* Solve the case and apprehend the guilty party
70010000084509.intro: Team up with your dog to investigate a baffling murder mystery
70010000084509.name: Murder Is Game Over: Streaming Death

70010000084692.description:
He's a dad AND a radish! Join Dadish on his quest to rescue his missing kids in three classic platforming adventures. Dadish Collection combines Dadish, Dadish 2 and Dadish 3 in one rad package.

• Three acclaimed retro platformers in one
• Dialogue that is funny-ish
• 150 awesome levels to beat
• Tons of rude and sassy baby radishes to find
• A whole bunch of fast food foes
• 15 ridiculously unhealthy bosses
• Lots of screechy possums
• The joys of fatherhood x3
• The soundtrack slaps
• The graphics are good if you like that sort of thing
• Heaps of collectable stars
• 3 unlockable secret characters
70010000084692.name: Dadish Collection

70010000085021.description:
*Inspirational retro-themed sci-fi setting, especially for the fans of sci-fi horror.
*Explore Moon's surface, abandoned Medical Bays, Warehouses and Cybernetics Laboratories.
*Use your inventory to solve complex audio-cyberpunk inspired puzzles.
*Drive a lunar vehicle to travel vast distances over the surface of the moon.
*Survive occasional jump-scares.
*Use your retro-inspired blaster gun to survive rouge A.I controlled androids.
*Sinister and Ominous soundtrack.

In the year 2049, the once-promising lunar research base, named "AstroGenica Lunar Nexus," has become a haunting beacon in the desolate expanses of the Moon. Serving as humanity's gateway to the cosmos, it now stands as a chilling testament to an experiment gone wrong.
As the protagonist, you awaken in the cold sterility of the medical bay, disoriented and alone. The eerie silence is broken only by the hum of malfunctioning machinery. An unsettling darkness envelops the lunar base, casting shadows that seem to writhe and pulse with malevolence.

Exploring the abandoned corridors and chambers, you discover cryptic remnants of the crew's activities – hasty recordings, fragmented logs, and ominous experiments conducted in the name of advancing human knowledge. It becomes clear that the crew's scientific pursuits unleashed an ancient extraterrestrial force, one that feeds on fear and has twisted reality within the confines of AstroGenica Lunar Nexus.
The nightmare deepens as you encounter grotesque manifestations of the crew's worst fears brought to life by the insidious lunar entity. Each step forward reveals more about the base's descent into madness, and the horrifying fate that befell those who once called it home.
Armed with only a flickering flashlight and your wits, you must navigate the increasingly nightmarish lunar landscape, solving puzzles, avoiding otherworldly threats, and piecing together the fragments of a dark cosmic secret. The lunar base holds the key to your survival, but it also harbors the eldritch horrors spawned by humanity's reckless curiosity.

As you inch closer to the heart of the lunar nightmare, the line between reality and delusion blurs, and the chilling truth awaits discovery. Will you unravel the mystery, or become another victim of the lunar entity's insatiable hunger for fear? The fate of AstroGenica Lunar Nexus rests in your hands, and the lunar nightmare may leave scars that transcend the boundaries of space and time.
70010000085021.intro: Lunar Nightmare is a retro-inspired sci-fi thriller, set on an abandoned Moon base...
70010000085021.name: Lunar Nightmare

70010000085188.description:
Do you have what it takes to steal the treasure without leaving a trace? Put your skills to the test and claim your prize!

Achieve your goal by any means necessary, whether through stealth, speed, or diversion. Use whatever tactics you can to avoid detection and always stay out of sight, or you'll regret it. 

Features:
- Complete over 250 unique levels!
- Avoid tricky obstacles and don't get caught!
- Use your hand to steal the riches!
- Equip awesome themes and skins!
- Enjoy funny sounds and visuals!

What are you waiting for? Start your journey and become a master thief today!
70010000085188.intro: Steal your way to the top and become the king of thieves!
70010000085188.name: Thief Puzzle

70050000049932.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock: 
- New sleigh skin for your cars!
- Snow trail!
- Blue flame trail!
- 25000 coins!

Get ready to clear some jams with a brand new look!
70050000049932.intro: Experience parking jam with a sleigh skin and icy trails!
70050000049932.name: Parking Jam: Snow Rush DLC

70050000049934.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock: 
- New food skin for your cars!
- Flame trail!
- Green fire trail!
- 25000 coins!

Get ready to clear some jams with a brand new look!
70050000049934.intro: Experience parking jam with a food skin and fiery trails!
70050000049934.name: Parking Jam: Fast Food DLC

70050000051113.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock: 
- 260 new levels for you to face!
- 13 cool skins for your hand!
- 6 colorful themes for a fresh look!

Equip new skins and prank others with style!
70050000051113.intro: Take on new challenges and become a master prankster!
70050000051113.name: Thief Puzzle: Pranks DLC

70050000051116.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock: 
- 260 new levels for you to face!
- 13 cool skins for your hand!
- 6 colorful themes for a fresh look!

Equip new skins and trick others with style!
70050000051116.intro: Take on new challenges and become a master trickster!
70050000051116.name: Thief Puzzle: Tricks DLC

70070000023881.description:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen? 

In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task! 

You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.

Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips! 

Invest your earnings into upgrading your restaurant and become a breakfast magnate!

This bundle includes base game, expansion pack #1 and expansion pack #4 with:

• 45 new levels to explore
• 8 new Achievements to complete
• Endless Mode

Bon appetite!
70070000023881.name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon Super Edition

70010000082411.description:
The circus is in town! Step up and try your luck!

Take aim with the cannon, gun, or balls in each challenging event!

Smash those coconuts and take home a victory!

Can you beat the fair?
70010000082411.intro: Roll up and take the shot!
70010000082411.name: Bizarre

70010000083480.description: You entered a train station and appear to be stuck in a loop. Multiple levels to test your observation skill. See if you have what it takes to escape the loop!
70010000083480.intro: Can you solve the anomaly challenges before time runs out?
70010000083480.name: Exit Station 7

70070000023321.description:
Embark on the ultimate journey into the mesmerizing world of  Hentai Girls with this exclusive bundle, featuring both the captivating main game and the enticing Hentai Anime Girls Succubus: New Image Puzzle DLC. Dive into a universe where tantalizing artwork meets an engaging storyline, and solving intricate puzzles uncovers the secrets within.

Features
	•	Engaging Storyline: Delve into a narrative filled with mystery, romance, and seduction. Solve puzzles to reveal an alluring story with enigmatic anime girls.
	•	Stunning Visuals: Explore a gallery of captivating characters with unique backstories. Enjoy stunning visuals and animations.
	•	Challenging Puzzles: Test your wit, unlocking new storylines. The DLC adds an extra layer of challenge and excitement with a new image puzzle.
	•	New Content: Includes the exclusive Succubus Anime image puzzle, challenging your mind and captivating your senses.
Unleash your inner detective, indulge in the allure of anime, and prepare for an unforgettable experience that will leave you yearning for more. This ultimate bundle is your gateway to an enchanting world of mystery, romance, and enticing puzzles, all in one captivating bundle.
70070000023321.intro: Ultimate anime adventure, mystery, romance and new puzzles just in a one bundle
70070000023321.name: Hentai Anime Girls Succubus - Extended Edition

70070000023864.description:
Get ready to fuel up for the ultimate off-road thrill with Buggy Off-Road Racing! Dive into this exhilarating journey as you navigate through the wild landscapes of the USA, Europe, and Asia. It's all about high-octane races where your bravery and skills are in the spotlight.

Dive into 12 off-road tracks
Take on 3 worldwide racing challenges
Unlock and upgrade 4 powerful buggies
Experience dynamic racing modes

Gear up to skid, drift, and accelerate over breathtaking turns and leaps. Are you up for making your mark and racing towards triumph? 

Jump into the driver's seat in Buggy Off-Road Racing and turn the whole world into your racing arena.

This bundle includes base game, Custom Cruisers #1 and Custom Cruisers #2 with:

-two new skins for each Buggy
70070000023864.intro: The Ultimate Dirt Track Challenge on your Nintendo Switch™!
70070000023864.name: Buggy Off-Road Racing Deluxe Edition

70070000023923.description:
In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

Game includes:
15+ STAGES
30+ WEAPONS
30+ GALLERY ITEMS
60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS 

This bundle includes base game, Weaponry Upgrade and Neon Strike with:

-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm 
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation 
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy 
-SHG-12-AQA: an aquatic-themed shotgun, with a blast like an ocean wave
-UZ-90-CLD: a frosty Uzi, delivering a cool demise
-SN-1200-NEO: a sniper rifle straight out of a neon dream, precision only matched by its glowing elegance.

Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!
70070000023923.name: S.N.I.P.E.R. - Hunter Scope - Tactical Arsenal

70010000080955.description:
Attention Chess players! Are you looking for a new challenge? Look no further than Dock Chess King! This exciting game provides hundreds of days to test your strategic thinking. With easy-to-use features and intuitive design, anyone can become a Chess King in no time.

- Challenge your tactical skills with a fun and addictive chess puzzle.
- Experience the thrill of improving your dock.
- Survive hordes of boss wishes while control ships, cargos and puzzle.
- Develop your dock until you can retire as Dock Chess King!

Revolutionary game about Chess Puzzle! Test your skills in this brain-boosting game and challenge yourself. Whether you're a beginner or a grandmaster, don't miss this opportunity to sharpen your chess moves and become the ultimate Chess King. Get ready to get hooked on this amazing game!
70010000080955.intro: Become Chess King: Command Your Strategy, Master the Game!
70010000080955.name: D.C.K.: Dock Chess King

70010000084023.description:
Forcefully awaken from his eternal sleep, ancient pharaoh Antef fearsomely discovers the horror his kingdom has fallen into. His throne stolen, his cult tarnished, the corruption, started by Apis, will soon be engulfing the world. The time has come for you to bring back order and give your people the peace they much deserve.

Traditionnaly respectful of the Metroidvania genre, ATARAXIE is a 2D plateformer which takes place in a world with interconnected levels. From maze to tombs, from desert to fortress, this a vast and liveful univers you will have to discover. Confidence is key, though, if you wish to put an end to this conspiracy.

A unique journey lies ahead! Through mastery and dexterity, ATARAXIE will face you with a plethora of fiend and foes, each of them disposing of unique powers and abilities. Explore the world, find its secrets and become stronger!

A thrilling adventure, worthy of hours of gameplay!
Luxurious and divers environnements, filled with puzzles!
Numerous Boss fights! A tribute to its inspirations, like Megaman!
The possibility to choose your own path, making the gaming experience unique to each player!
70010000084023.name: Ataraxie

70010000083742.description:
Push monster balls into holes or traps in randomly generated levels. Stack up countless game-changing items to create broken builds. Find combos to create your own synergies and customize your playstyle. Rack and Slay!

UNIQUE GAMEPLAY: Face physics-based billiards combat challenges tied together by a rogue-like run structure in a dungeon setting!
LONG-TERM REPLAYABILITY: Procedural dungeon layouts filled with randomized monsters, obstacles and power-ups combine with a large variety of 100+ items to draft from to ensure no two runs play the same!
RELENTLESS CHALLENGE: Climb through 20 difficulty levels, each one modifying the game to become more challenging!
GAME MODES: Play a full dungeon crawl in 20-30 minutes, or condense your run to half the length with extra loot, or tackle a single-level raid for just a few minutes!
DAILY RUNS: Face a new gauntlet featuring a unique combination of run modifiers every single day!
SIMPLE CONTROLS: Pick-up-and-play controls make sure you’ll aim and shoot within seconds!
70010000083742.intro: The rogue-like dungeon crawler where you're a billiard ball!
70010000083742.name: Rack and Slay

70010000065444.description:
Join millions of players and stumble to victory in this fun multiplayer knockout battle royale! Are you ready to enter the running chaos? Running, stumbling, falling, jumping, and winning has never been so fun!

DODGE OBSTACLES AND BATTLE YOUR OPPONENTS
Run, stumble and fall against up to 32 players and battle through knockout rounds of races, survival elimination, and team play in different maps, levels and game modes. Survive the fun multiplayer chaos and cross the finish line before your friends to qualify for the next round, earning fun rewards and stars as you continue to play and win in Stumble Guys! 

PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY 
Create your own multiplayer party and play against friends and family. Find out who runs the fastest, battles with the best skills and survives the chaos!

UNLOCK AND UPGRADE YOUR GAMEPLAY
Personalise and customise your chosen Stumbler with special emojis, animations, and footsteps. Show off your unique style and personality as you stumble your way to victory. 

STUMBLE PASS
Fresh Stumble Pass every month with new content customisations and other rewards! 

EXPLORE THE WORLD OF STUMBLE GUYS
Explore the world of Stumble Guys with over 30 maps, levels and game modes that offer even more ways to play, and experience the fastest multiplayer knockout battle royale. Join the party and get ready to stumble, fall and win your way to victory.
70010000065444.name: Stumble Guys

70070000023352.description:
Embark on the ultimate trucking adventure with "Truck Simulator 2024: USA Driver Zone - Millionaire's Edition." This special bundle combines the immersive base game with the thrilling "Millionaire's Dream DLC," offering a unique journey for truckers of all levels.

Key Features:
	•	Diverse Truck Selection: Choose from a fleet of meticulously detailed trucks, each with unique handling.
	•	Instant Wealth: Start your journey with a million dollars to invest in your trucking empire, thanks to the Millionaire's Dream DLC.
	•	Premium Upgrades: Access exclusive high-end trucks and top-of-the-line upgrades from the beginning.
	•	Mission Variety: Engage in a multitude of missions and jobs that challenge your driving skills.
	•	Open World Exploration: Roam freely through a beautifully crafted map inspired by the stunning American landscape.
In "Truck Simulator 2024: USA Driver Zone - Millionaire's Edition," you're not just driving; you're mastering the art of trucking while enjoying the luxuries of instant wealth and premium vehicles. Strap in, hit the road, and make your mark on the American highways with the ultimate trucker's dream bundle.
70070000023352.intro: Embark on a millionaire's adventure with the ultimate trucking Simulator Bundle, transform your trucking career with last premium upgrades!
70070000023352.name: Truck Simulator 2024 - USA Driver Zone Premium Edition

70070000023604.description:
Join millions of players and stumble to victory in this fun multiplayer knockout battle royale! Are you ready to enter the running chaos? Running, stumbling, falling, jumping, and winning has never been so fun! 

The Stumble Guys Founder's Pack is only available until August 20th 2024. It includes: 
Hi Sp33d P0rtia Mythic Stumbler 
Oh Yeah Animation 
2000 Gems 

Explore the world of Stumble Guys with over 30 maps, levels and game modes that offer even more ways to play, and experience the fastest multiplayer knockout battle royale. Join the party and get ready to stumble, fall, and win your way to victory.
70070000023604.name: Stumble Guys - Founder's Pack Bundle

70010000071206.description:
Join the adventure as Yuhiko, a young ninja who has gone to the underworld to find a cure for his brother. Find Spirits in secret places – they will tell you a story or give you advice. Explore dungeons, fight monsters and meet new friends!

The second part of the game will delight you with new types of enemies, fresh gameplay mechanics, and battles with dangerous bosses. If desired, each level can also be attempted in a speedrun. The second part of the game is perfect not only for those already familiar with the black-and-white world of Mangavania but also for newcomers to the series.

Can the young ninja save his brother, and if so, at what cost?
70010000071206.intro: Old school action platformer game with pixel art graphics.
70010000071206.name: Mangavania 2

70010000072418.description:
Cyber Mission is a side-scrolling shoot ’em up with retro aesthetics, dynamic combat, HD visuals and intense combat inspired by classic elements from both run ’n gun and shooter genres. Take on your adversaries solo or team up with a friend in local co-op! Float and maneuver through zero gravity stages, blast enemy swarms, take down screen-filling bosses and use companion cyber drones to increase your forward fire rate, cover your back and more!

Features:

• Experience an intense blend of shoot ’em up and run ’n gun gameplay elements!
• Take the role of a cyber trooper and blast through hordes of alien invaders.
• Strategize on the fly as you use drones for cover and turn to fire backward or forward!
• Enjoy HD widescreen presentation with retro aesthetics.
• Fight solo or team up with a friend for local co-op!
70010000072418.intro: Fight for the future of the galaxy as a cyber trooper in a mix of shoot ’em up and run ’n gun action!
70010000072418.name: Cyber Mission

70010000082053.description:
You have an empire at your command and the world at your feet. Your hands hold the happiness, hopes, and lives of an entire nation, and those who call you, their ruler.  

You have everything, and yet, in your heart, you have nothing.   

You are Emperor Hong, the esteemed Emperor of the Crimson Empire, and you have experienced profound loss. Following the passing of your mother, the former ruler, you tragically lost your beloved Empress as well. 

Faced with no other options, you are compelled to summon and seek the aid of the Yaoguai, forbidden but powerful creatures of the north with a taste for human souls, to assist you in resolving imperial challenges, enforcing your will, and supporting the welfare of your citizens. 

You are far from the only ruler in the world, and balancing the needs of your people with the businesses you conduct with other rulers will be a difficult necessity on the path of growing the Crimson Empire. However, once your land has hit the peak of its prosperity, you are given a choice live with all you have created or command the Yaoguai to bring about a calamity to devour your empire and sacrifice your people in a bid to resurrect your beloved empress.  


Game Features: 
• A unique mix of resource management, East and Southeast Asia mythology, and an Empire sim. 
• Summon Yaoguai to assist you in your imperial duties, each Yaoguai has unique traits and characteristics.  
• Build relationships with your Yaoquai to empower them, making them powerful allies or potent sacrifices. 
• Work with other rulers to achieve your ultimate goal or choose a different path alongside them. 
• Simulation-based gameplay that directly impacts the story. 
• A majestic soundtrack inspired by the immersive fantasy world of My Lovely Empress. 
• A mesmerizing Asian ink-brush art style that combines 2D and 3D visuals.
70010000082053.intro: My Lovely Empress is an empire management sim inspired by Asian mythology.
70010000082053.name: My Lovely Empress

70010000085684.description:
This coming-of-age journey will take us to the top of the mountain through a story of effort, friendship, and community; and will let our hearts fly free.

Take your magic broom and discover all the secrets hidden in the mountain while getting to know its charming inhabitants. Work hard and get a magic broom good enough to achieve your goal: to go to the top of the mountain.

The heart of the game is a pleasant and fulfilling fly sensation. Mika will soar the skies while exploring the beautiful landscapes of Mont Gaun in her journey to the top of the mountain.

Mika will deliver packages to the villagers all over the island and they will rate her service. That way she will earn money to get new brooms with unique flying capabilities.
70010000085684.intro: Mika and the Witch’s Mountain is a fantasy adventure about an aspiring witch who delivers packages to the townspeople of a small island.
70010000085684.name: Mika and the Witch's Mountain

70070000023510.description:
Dive into three games of grief, woe, and all-consuming love fueled by the dark arts and human sacrifice, brought to you by the evils at Game Changer Studio and proudly published by the enclave of Neon Doctrine.

This bundle includes:
• My Lovely Empress
• My Lovely Wife
• My Lovely Daughter
70070000023510.intro: What would you do to save your loved ones? Befriend, nurture, and murder new companions and lovers alike to gain mastery over the most sinister magics and mend your broken heart!
70070000023510.name: My Lovely Series

70010000079021.description:
Hikaru finds himself out of luck and homeless on an unfamiliar island. 

While avoiding pit vipers and angry senior committee members, he comes across a witch in a very similar situation. 

The two set out to survive, and hopefully thrive, on Toyotoki, the uncompromising island secluded from the modern world that is steeped in ancient traditions and shrouded in mystery.

Along the way, they meet a cheeky island beauty, a haughty rich girl, a clumsy saleswoman, and a manga-loving delinquent, all of whom are island locals on a similar mission to discover themselves and their place in the world. 

With some hard work and a sprinkle of magic, can the unlikely group of friends unravel the mystery of Toyotoki Island, while also finding success in their journey of self-discovery?
70010000079021.name: Tales from Toyotoki: Arrival of the Witch

70010000079398.description:
With nine unique characters to choose from, you find yourself in the Ring Sculptors' base, a hub of avant-garde artists crafting sculptures from interplanetary matter. Will you survive? Or will your mind be lost in the Network? Can you maintain your sanity?

Craft your own path through a world filled with intrigue, danger, and unexpected twists. Your character's stats will influence your journey as you encounter various characters and navigate the complexities of this sci-fi realm.

Inspired by Tomasz Kołodziejczak's "Ring Sculptors," this interactive experience offers multiple endings and a truly immersive adventure where every decision shapes your destiny. Are you ready to sculpt your own fate?

Features:
●	Discover an engaging narrative with choices that truly matter - every playthrough can be different, depending on your choices, statistics, and a bit of luck
●	Reach multiple endings based on your decisions
●	Explore a dystopian sci-fi world filled with intrigue and danger
●	Meet a variety of characters
●	Customize your character with unique stats, unlocking different paths and possibilities
●	Each playthrough offers a fresh experience with different possibilities and huge replayability - what if you chose another option this time?
70010000079398.intro: A gripping text-based narrative adventure set in a dystopian future where your choices truly matter.
70010000079398.name: Ring Sculptors

70010000081047.description:
A THRILLING STORY
The year is 1888, the war against the ruthless "Nation" is coming to a head and threatens to completely destroy the alternate land of Hemera. As a last resort to save their world, Jules Verne and Captain Nemo embark on a search for the legendary city of Atlantis aboard the infamous submarine Nautilus.

If the legends are to be believed, an ancient artefact lies buried there that has the power to change the course of history: the Flame of Hephaestus! An artefact whose mighty power was once responsible for both the rise and fall of legendary Atlantis.
On his journey, Jules Verne will not only discover unimaginable wonders and mysteries - he must also confront a dark and seemingly overpowering entity whose sole ambition is to eradicate the power of imagination from the minds of all the people of Hemera ... including his!

GAMEPLAY
• Unleash your imagination: Use the power of the IMAG, an ancient device from Atlantis, to rewrite history and change Verne's fate at certain moments.
• Write your own story: The non-linear dialogue makes for a varied gameplay experience that reflects the human ability to imagine and tell the most fantastic stories.
• An Atlantis-tic scavenger hunt: In gameplay inspired by classic adventure games, solving puzzles and exploring every inch of your surroundings is always the key to success.
• No Ruin Left Unturned: The atmospheric and detailed pixel art steampunk world invites you to explore: from the dark corridors of the Nautilus to the ancient ruins of Atlantis.
• With attention to detail: Become part of a fascinating story about the life and works of Jules Verne.
70010000081047.intro: Become Jules Verne and adventure into the dangers that hide in Hemera, a fantastic parallel world built from his own imagination.
70010000081047.name: Verne - The Shape of Fantasy

70010000083576.description:
Choose your aircraft from a diverse fleet of high-tech aircraft and take to the skies to battle your opponents in fast-paced, intense racing.

Each aircraft has unique characteristics and capabilities, allowing you to choose the perfect aircraft for your play style. Whether you want to be fast and agile or prefer power and firepower, the choice is yours!

During the races, you will not only have to outrun your opponents, but also use various boosters and projectiles to gain an advantage. Collect boosters to get ahead, and arm yourself with rockets, machine guns and other weapons to neutralise your competitors.

The game offers many different tracks, each of which is full of dangerous turns, narrow passages and unexpected obstacles. Overcome them with skill and precision to reach the finish line first. This is a real air battle, where every manoeuvre and every decision can be decisive. Test your piloting skills, strategic thinking and reactions in this exciting game where only the best can rise to the top and become champions of the skies!
70010000083576.intro: Welcome to the exciting world of air plane racing, where speed and strategy are everything!
70010000083576.name: Sky Airplane Racer: Flight & Fight Simulator

70010000084252.description:
This coloring book is a guarantee of good mood.
In it you can find all kinds of pictures for every taste.
Coloring by numbers with Colorizing is a calming and easy activity for people of all ages. 
This drawing game is suitable for children and adults, everyone can enjoy pixel coloring.
You will definitely love coloring with this beautiful coloring book!
70010000084252.intro: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation
70010000084252.name: Colorizing

70010000085198.description:
【Introduction】
The story is set in a world two years after a major bioterrorist attack that killed 170,000 people.
The story's protagonist, a journalist, miraculously survived that atrocity and has since devoted himself to solving the mystery of the attacks.
As our story begins, he receives a phone call. The caller tells him they wish to reveal the truth behind the virus used in the attacks two years ago...
Skeptical, he nevertheless follows the directions he has been given and finds himself arriving at a deserted mansion.
What he encounters there is beyond belief...

【Game Play】
The aim of the game is to use a range of weapons, including handguns, shotguns, and rocket launchers, to defeat terrifying monsters and escape from the mansion and laboratory.
This survival-action horror game is a classic FPS. The player is constantly forced to choose to either fight against their enemies or flee to safety. This management of the limited items available creates gameplay imbued with a sense of palpable tension.
The game also features multiple endings, meaning that the game's conclusion changes dramatically based on the player's actions.

【About QuietMansion1】
The original game, released in 2018 as "KENGOHAZARD," has been remade using modern technology and development techniques. With an all-new map, the title has evolved so much that it plays like an entirely new game.

【Audio】
The first game to feature the independently developed Enhanced Real Sound Effect (ERSE) audio system.
The atmosphere generated by the 3D audio effects creates a brand-new horror experience unlike anything seen before.

【Game Overview】
Title: QuietMansion1
Genre: FPS survival action horror
Hashtag: #QuietMansion
70010000085198.intro: Experience the ultimate in immersive terror.
70010000085198.name: QuietMansion1

70010000081699.description:
Welcome to "Pixel Drift - Retro Car Racing" — a virtual time machine transporting you to the atmosphere of unbridled fun and adrenaline of the 80s. This thrilling racing adventure promises an unforgettable experience where speed and style converge in an entirely new pixelated dimension.Game Features:
	•	Time Race Mode: Test your skills in races against the clock, feeling the rhythmic pulsation of each second, in pursuit of the perfect time.
	•	Firefight Mode: Beware the moment when the race turns into a true battle. In this mode, you'll fight not only for supremacy but also for survival, utilizing the unique abilities of your car.
	•	Ring Races: Dive into the whirlwind of ring races, where driving mastery and precise overtaking play a decisive role. Navigate through winding tracks and show that you are a true ring race master.
	•	Sprint Mode: Feel the wind of change as you participate in exhilarating sprint races. You have just a few seconds to cross the finish line — ascend to the pinnacle of the art of sprint racing.
"Pixel Drift - Retro Car Racing" offers a genuine break from modern trends. This racing journey is not just about races; it's about the pure joy of fast cars and endless roads, animated by the spirit of the 80s. Immerse yourself in a whirlwind of memories and enjoy races that will leave a mark in your heart, reminiscent of moments from the golden era of arcade games.
70010000081699.intro: Rediscover the golden era of arcade games, feel the adrenaline and joy of high-speed 80s racing!
70010000081699.name: Pixel Retro Drift - Arcade Car Racing

70010000084092.description:
In the distant future, "Thermonuclear," is the most advanced military cyborg weapon technology ever created.

As a member of a mega-corporation, use this ultimate weapon to defeat your opponents and end the Third World War. Explore procedurally generated levels across the globe and face a range of enemies, from mutants in ruined cities to soldiers and robots in military factories. Only by upgrading your cyborg and unlocking new abilities can you defeat the malicious Allfather AI and put an end to the war.

Can you emerge victorious in this dystopian future conflict?


Features
* Turn-based roguelike strategy game
* Procedurally generated levels
* Upgrade skills and combine weapons
* Memorable characters and story
70010000084092.name: Thermonuclear

70010000082114.description:
Welcome!
 Now you will discover how the real power of money moves the world, 
and you'll embark on a journey of survival as you uncover the many secrets hidden within.

But be warned, this adventure doesn't end with mere survival.
 You will have to fight a fierce battle to pay off your debts and gain your freedom in order to escape the dark maze of the dungeon.
We wish you success. Go beyond survival to freedom.

The world of the game is more than just an idle game. It's a story-driven adventure about the escape of people trapped in an underground prison.
 Discover hidden clues, items, and equipment and interact with colourful characters to uncover new stories.
70010000082114.intro:
An adventure into the mysterious world of the underground Labour Office begins.
Here, money decides everything.
70010000082114.name: Underground Station

70070000023527.description:
Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon. Cook, chop, bake and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes.

But the journey of a thousand dishes is just the beginning!

As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC.

Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations. Keep the grill hot, keep your customers smiling, sauté, mix and serve to the top.

Face cooking challenges to become the ultimate chef in town!

So put on your apron, sharpen your knives and enter the cooking arena. Life is a party - let's cook delicious!

This bundle contains "Food Truck Tycoon" and "Sweet Bakery Tycoon".
70070000023527.intro: Universe bursting with flavors and culinary adventures awaits!
70070000023527.name: Cooking Arena Pastry Chef

70070000023547.description:
Unlock the Ultimate Racing Experience with the "Drift Master Simulator 2024 - Driving Sim" Bundle!
